item.title: Joint Economic Forecast
item.description: The Joint Economic Forecast is prepared bi-annually in spring and in autumn on behalf of the Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Energy. The forecast is prepared by: German Institute for Economic Research (DIW Berlin) ifo Institute - Leibniz Institute for Economic Research at the University of Munich in cooperation with the KOF Swiss Economic Institute – ETH Zurich Kiel Institute for the World Economy (IfW) Halle Institute for Economic Research (IWH) – Member of the Leibniz Association RWI – Leibniz Institute for Economic Research in cooperation with the Institute for Advanced Studies in Vienna

item.title: RWI Business Cycle Forecasts
item.description: The RWI – Leibniz Institute for Economic Research conducts a quarterly analysis of the business cycle developments in Germany and provides a short term forecast (up to 2 years). This analysis includes a detailed forecast for the internatinoal economy bi-annualy (March and September). Below you will find a collection of the forecasts that I have taken part of.
